title: Chicken and asparagus quiche
description: This quick and easy quiche is a tasty way of using up leftover roast chicken - and it makes great picnic food too!
ingredients: 9 free-range eggs, 1 beaten for the glaze
300g/10½fl oz cooked leftover roast chicken, cut into 3cm/1¼in chunks
1 bag green salad leaves, to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
